title: Bug 116564: The title of hyperlink builder should be "Hyperlink Options", but it changes with settings.
OB: When clicking on "OK" and then reopening the hyperlink builder, the actual result is that its title becomes "www.actuate.com".
EB: The expected result is that the hyperlink builder should have the title "Hyperlink Options".
SR: To reproduce the issue, follow these steps: 1. Set a label hyperlink as "www.actuate.com". 2. Click on "OK" and then reopen the hyperlink builder.
